This is a poisoned knight. If black plays 20.... Bxc5 then 21. Qxb7+ Qc6+ 22.Kc8 Qxb5 racking up more material with a strong attack.  Now somehow white has turned the tables and has a powerful attack!
A possibility to prevent Qxb7. Another option was Nd6 I think both were just as worse. From this point in I was in a strong attacking position.
